{{Wireless embedded system |brand=DrayTek |model=Vigor 2925 |revision=ac |series= |ean=4716779078855 |asin=B015GC37H4 |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |manuf= |manuf_model= |availability=now |est_release_date= |fcc_date=05/12/2015 |fcc_id=VGYV2860AC |pcb_id= |type=wireless router |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Lantiq |cpu1_model=PSB 80920;Lantiq, PSB 80920 EL V1.2, XWAY VRX288, 7G31801I00, H1335; |cpu1_cspeed=600 |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=Toshiba |fla1_model=TC58NVG0S3ETA00 |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=EtronTech |ram1_model=EM68C16CWQD-25H |expansion_if_types=Mini PCIe, USB 2.0 |expansion_minipcie_num=1 |expansion_usb_num=2 |serial= |jtag= |wi1_module=Alpha Networks WMC-AC05HP |wi1_module_if=Mini PCIe (oversize) |wi1_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=QCA9880;QCA9880-BR4A; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL, RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=3 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=3 |wi2_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi2_chip1_model=QCA9582 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL, RP-SMA |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |sw_model=QCA8337;QCA8337-AL3C; |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=5 |wan_speed=1GbE |wan_ports=2 |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=00:1D:AA, 54:2A:A2 |oui_eth=00:1D:AA }} {{TagLine|Dual WAN Security Firewall Router}} :[https://www.draytek.com/en/products/products-a-z/router.all/vigor2925-series Product page] {{•}} [https://www.draytek.com/en/download/firmware/vigor2925-series/ User's guide] :[http://eu.draytek.com:50000/Logon.php Smart Monitor Demo] {{•}} [http://eu.draytek.com:12925 Demo UI]
"8WMCAC05.2A1G" and "1412" is silkscreened on the card in the [https://fccid.io/document.php?id=2610403 FCC photos].
{{See also|DrayTek Vigor 2760Vn|Alpha Networks}}
Default settings are per the FCC manual.
===Specifications=== *Dual Gigabit Ethernet WAN port for failover and load-balancing *2x USB 2.0 ports for 3G/LTE mobile, FTP server and network printers *5x Gigabit LAN ports with multiple subnets *Working with VigorACS SI Central Management for multi-site deploymen *Integrated with 802.11ac wireless access point (Vigor 2925ac/2925Vac) *VoIP for cost-effective communication (Vigor 2925Vac/2925Vn-plus)
===Reviews=== *[http://www.pcworld.idg.com.au/review/draytek/vigor-2925ac/582049/ Reviewed on '''PCWorld'''] *[https://geektimes.ru/company/digitalangel/blog/280228/ Reviewed on '''GeekTimes'''] (RU) *[http://www.mbreviews.com/best-dual-wan-routers/#draytek-vigor2925ac ''DrayTek Vigor 2925ac'' Reviewed on '''MBReviews'''] :Flash: ''Toshiba'' TC58NVG0S3ETA00 128MB (128M x 8bit) :RAM: ''EtronTech'' EM68C16CWQD-25H 128MB (NAND) :Switch: [[Atheros]] AR8327 (GbE) *[https://www.mbreviews.com/draytek-vigor2926-review/ ''DrayTek Vigor 2926'' Reviewed on '''MBReviews'''] :Lantiq CPU @720MHz for all variants (2926/2926ac/2926Vac) :128MB Toshiba TC58NVG0S3ETA00 LF0525 - CMOS NAND Flash Memory :128MB Winbond W971GG6SB-25 G8173H400532 - SDRAM DDR2 :Qualcomm Atheros AR8035-A NJ806004 1806 CN - Ethernet PHY Chip :LVC08A 8980032 YXD18 - Logic Gate, 2x PKP DIP2401-AG 1823 IC :2x G2PM109N LF 1825E - 1000 Base-T Dual Port Magnetic Modules
===See also=== *[[DrayTek Vigor 3220ac]] - Dual-WAN Security Firewall :• FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/VGYV2860AC VGYV2860AC] (05/12/2015) [https://fccid.io/document.php?id=2610411 Doc] *[[DrayTek Vigor 2925ac]] - Dual-WAN Security Firewall :• FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/VGYV2860AC VGYV2860AC] (05/12/2015) [https://fccid.io/document.php?id=2610411 Doc] :Lantiq PSB 80920, QCA8337-AL3C, QCA9880 (5GHz) *[[DrayTek Vigor 2860ac]] - Dual-WAN Security Firewall :• FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/VGYV2860AC VGYV2860AC] (05/12/2015) *[[DrayTek Vigor 2860Vn]] - Dual-WAN Security Firewall :• FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/VGYV2860VN VGYV2860VN] (01/09/2014) • [[DrayTek Vigor 2925n]] :[[Alpha Networks]] WMC-ND07 (5GHz), RT5392L (2.4GHz) *[[DrayTek Vigor 2952n]] - Dual-WAN Security Firewall :• FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/VGY2952 VGY2952] (10/04/2016) :CPU: [[MediaTek]] MT7621AT @880MHz Dual Core :WLAN: [[MediaTek]] MT7602EN 2T2R 802.11bgn *[[DrayTek Vigor 2912n]] - Dual-WAN Security Firewall *[[DrayTek Vigor 2830n]] *[[DrayTek Vigor 2760Vn]] *[[DrayTek Vigor 2710ne]]
